title: Qwerty AI: Explainable Automated Age Rating and Content Safety Assessment for Russian-Language Screenplays
summary: We present Qwerty AI, an end-to-end system for automated age-rating and content-safety assessment of Russian-language screenplays according to Federal Law No. 436-FZ.
